metadata.title: CVE-2021-39937 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A collision in access memoization logic in all versions of GitLab CE/EEbefore 14.3.6, all versions starting from 14.4 before 14.4.4, all versionsstarting from 14.5 before 14.5.2, leads to potential elevated privileges ingroups and projects under rare circumstances

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
